message: Hi Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this product for $9,500. I believe it will be very valuable for you.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your valuation of the product, but I am looking to keep my investment within a certain budget. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $8,800 for the product.
Bob, I understand your position but I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations and be worth the investment. How about we meet in the middle at $9,100?

Thank you for considering my position, Alice. I appreciate your efforts in finding a middle ground. While I understand the value you see in this product, I am still committed to staying within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $8,900?
